channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Markdown Formatter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Markdown Formatter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21660|2024-08-03T18:23:27.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20markdown%20formatter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Markdown Formatter Plugin 0.1.0 and earlier does not sanitize crafted link target URLs, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with the ability to edit any description rendered using the configured markup formatter.
